description: Overview:Experience portable comfort and precision control in a notebook mouseWork efficiently in meetings, on airplanes, and at your desk with the Microsoft® Notebook Optical Mouse 3000. The Tilt Wheel Technology provides 4-way scrolling and the Magnifier enlarges details for precise page control. An ergonomic design makes it comfortable to use, even in tight quarters.Features:   Magnifier*Just point and click to enlarge and edit details in real time with the Magnifier. 4-Way ScrollingUse the Tilt Wheel to easily and efficiently scroll side to side as well as up and down in spreadsheets, Web pages, photos, and more. ComfortGet a grip with recessed sides, comfortable shape, and design created for either hand. Additional Features:Microsoft High Definition Optical Technology -Experience ultimate performance in the palm of your hand. Microsoft’s High Definition mouse products are more precise, more responsive, and deliver smoother tracking.Stylish Design- Express yourself: this mouse’s sophisticated design and LED tail light reflect your style.Snap-in receiver- A small receiver snaps into the bottom of the mouse when it is not in use.Customizable Buttons- Get quick access to the media, programs, and files you use most often with customizable buttons.  System Requirements::Windows Vista®/XP/Me/200045 MBor Mac OS X v.10.2–10.4.X15 MBUSB PortCD Drive
title: Microsoft Notebook Optical Mouse 3000
